data.message:
I love you #Eminem #MarshallMathers #SlimShady #Rabbit 
You are a big part of my life
Thank you so much for me to change
You know I am Indian but I do not listen to the Song of India
I'm only listen your raps 
and I'm feel very different 
i feel painless
I'm forget all problems 
I'm every time I feel like  You are with me
I pray you are fine and everything is fine in your family
I love you heart love brain love 
#MyGod
